subject: Broken Pro X Ultra throttle.
description_text:
Hello,

I recently purchased a set of your Pro X Ultra Pedals from Amazon.  Within
an hour of use, the throttle pedal stopped working correctly.  The small
plastic plate at the front of the pedal which holds the spring that acts on
the load cell snapped(please see attached photo).  Is it possible to get a
replacement part?

Thank you,

Reuben Clemons

conversations.body_text:
Thank you for the prompt reply!

Here is the Amazon order number:

113-3445598-6823415

My shipping address is :

15722 48th Ave W
Apt 1
Edmonds, WA. 98026


Thank you!

Reuben Clemons

On Mon, Aug 4, 2025 at 11:31 PM General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> Hi Reuben, I am sorry for the issue you mentioned, could you please tell
> us your order number and shipping address? We will ship a replacement to you
> ------------------------------
> service@simsonn.com
>
>

Hi Reuben Clemons,  We will send you a replacement throttle pedal component. Adjusting the travel to its minimum limit may have caused the sensor plate to hit the blue stopper and break.

Thank you for all of your help. I will be sure to verify placement of the
travel stop so that it is not at its minimum setting.
